snippet: Why the discount-chain merger is bad news for poor shoppers.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Louis Hyman holds merger of Dollar Tree and Family Dollar will be unfortunate for Americans on limited budgets, even while it makes millions for hedge funds; says explanation for merger, to extract better deals from suppliers, is flawed since stores have different inventories and suppliers; warns many Family Dollar stores, which sell boxed and canned food, may shut down, cutting off access needy consumers.
lead_paragraph: Why the discount-chain merger is bad news for poor shoppers.

headline.main: A Tale of Two Dollar Stores
headline.print_headline: A Tale of Two Dollar Stores
